1553770.name: Schwarzerblitz - HYPERFIGHT Collaboration Costume
1553770.description:
Would you like a taste?

The most obnoxious evil robot primadonna of Schwarzerblitz cosplays as the crooked CEO of Doncorp: Don McRon from HYPERFIGHT! This official collaboration costume will make the wryyyyyyng robot one with the power of fries and ketchup. TIME FOR YOU TO CLOCK OUT!

Important Note

To use this DLC costume, you need first to have unlocked H-168 Krave by either:
  • clearing the game's arcade mode with Cyphr Wolfchild OR
  • answering YES to the initial "unlock all characters" prompt OR
  • clearing the story episode "Gimme Fuel, Baby" OR
  • using one of the cheat codes listed in the Discussion threads.
1553770.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
